price: Allah alternates the night and day. Indeed, there is a lesson in this for people of insight.
arabic: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yuqallibu al-lahu al-layla wal-nahāra inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan li-ulī al-abṣāri
